mapper.sql: SELECT zk_my_public_course.mpcId, zk_my_public_course.uId, zk_my_public_course.score, zk_course.cId, zk_course.cNo, zk_course.cName, zk_course.cEnglishName, zk_course.courseType, zk_course.qualityHours, zk_course.cCredits, zk_course.teachingHours, zk_course.experimentalHours, zk_course.computerClassHours, zk_course.otherClassHours, zk_course.teachingProgram, zk_organization.oId, zk_organization.organizationName, zk_organization.organizationTypeId, zk_organization.organizationNo, zk_public_course_profiles.pcpId, zk_public_course_profiles.recommend, zk_public_course_profiles.evaluation, zk_public_course_profiles.good_count, zk_public_course_profiles.bad_count, zk_public_course_type.pctId, zk_public_course_type.publicCourseTypeName, zk_term.termId, zk_term.termName, zk_term.termNo, zk_term.beginDate, zk_term.endDate, zk_term.status, zk_course.cNameNo FROM zk_my_public_course left join zk_course on zk_my_public_course.cNameNo=zk_course.cNameNo left join zk_organization on zk_course.organizationNo = zk_organization.organizationNo left join zk_public_course_profiles on zk_course.cNo=zk_public_course_profiles.cNo left join zk_public_course_type on zk_public_course_profiles.pctId = zk_public_course_type.pctId left join zk_term on zk_my_public_course.termNo = zk_term.termNo
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO zk_my_public_course (uid, termNo, cNameNo, score) VALUES (#{uid},#{term.no},#{cNameNo},#{score})
